Package hecc_up

package hecc_up
This is HECC-UP (HECC Uncomplicated Parser). You give it a .hecc file, it looks at it, and, if it's a valid .hecc file, it'll give you a HECCIN Game. Or it'll complain.
Author:
Rachel Lowe
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    FolderOutputterMetadataInterface
    This is an interface for the Metadata class to be used by FolderOutputter
    LoggerInterface
    An interface for boundary classes that are supposed to be able to log data.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    FolderOutputter
    This class is responsible for outputting the HECCIN' Game into the folder it's supposed to be output into.
    HeccParser
    This parses the full HECC code bottom text
    HeccUpGUI
    This class is basically a GUI for the HECC-UP stuff so a user can actually, y'know, hecc up their stuff.
    HeccUpHandler
    An intermediate class, between the user-facing LoggerInterface object, and the lower-level PassageParser and FolderOutputter objects
    HeccUpTests
    Some tests for HECC-UP
    HeccUpTests.HeccUpTestConstants
    Some constants for use in the tests.
    HeccUpTests.HeccUpTestLogger
    Basically a LoggerInterface class that records the logged stuff.
    OldHeccUpMain
    Deprecated.
    just use HeccUpGUI instead lmao
